title: [Product] Cos72 - Cards, Points, Perks
rawContent:
## Description
A framework for user engagement and community incentives, featuring Cards, Points, and Perks.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Define Card structure,Implement Points system,Develop Perks distribution

acceptanceCriteriaItems.text: Define Card structure,Implement Points system,Develop Perks distribution

description: A framework for user engagement and community incentives, featuring Cards, Points, and Perks.

title: [Product] Sign90 - Aggregate Signatures & Security
rawContent:
## Description
Security module focusing on aggregate signatures and decentralized verification (DVT).

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Implement BLS signature aggregation,Design DVT security model,Integrate with AAStar SDK

acceptanceCriteriaItems.text: Implement BLS signature aggregation,Design DVT security model,Integrate with AAStar SDK

description: Security module focusing on aggregate signatures and decentralized verification (DVT).

title: [Project] SuperPaymaster - Decentralized Gas Payment
rawContent:
## Description
A decentralized Gas Payment Protocol enabling gasless transactions through credit and community sponsorship.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Implement Credit System,Add Operator Staking,Support Multiple Token Strategies

acceptanceCriteriaItems.text: Implement Credit System,Add Operator Staking,Support Multiple Token Strategies

description: A decentralized Gas Payment Protocol enabling gasless transactions through credit and community sponsorship.

title: [Project] AL Account (AirAccount) - Abstract Account Layer
rawContent:
## Description
User account abstraction layer (AirAccount) providing seamless onboarding and interaction.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Support Social Login,Implement Session Keys,Enable Cross-Chain Operations

acceptanceCriteriaItems.text: Support Social Login,Implement Session Keys,Enable Cross-Chain Operations

description: User account abstraction layer (AirAccount) providing seamless onboarding and interaction.

Release the first version of Cos72 Chrome Extension, integrating SuperPaymaster and AirAccount for seamless onboarding.

title: [Release] Sign90 - Base Version v1.0
rawContent:

Launch the foundational security layer Sign90, featuring custom smart accounts and automated agents.
...
description:

title: [Feature] Paymaster V4 - Self-Operated & Stablecoin
rawContent:
## Description
Implement Paymaster V4 (Pre-paid) and SuperPaymaster (Credit-based) in a unified project.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Implement Paymaster V4 with pre-paid model,Implement SuperPaymaster with credit/reputation mapping,Support repayment logic for SuperPaymaster,Integrate Chainlink Oracle for gas price

acceptanceCriteriaItems.text: Implement Paymaster V4 with pre-paid model,Implement SuperPaymaster with credit/reputation mapping,Support repayment logic for SuperPaymaster,Integrate Chainlink Oracle for gas price

description: Implement Paymaster V4 (Pre-paid) and SuperPaymaster (Credit-based) in a unified project.

title: [Feature] Comet ENS - Free Subdomain Service
rawContent:
## Description
Provide users with free ENS subdomains (e.g., user.comet.eth) and internet domain mapping.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Deploy ENS resolver on Sepolia/OP,Support default subdomain allocation,Map internet domains to on-chain addresses

acceptanceCriteriaItems.text: Deploy ENS resolver on Sepolia/OP,Support default subdomain allocation,Map internet domains to on-chain addresses

description: Provide users with free ENS subdomains (e.g., user.comet.eth) and internet domain mapping.

title: [Feature] Sign90 - Smart Account Core
rawContent:
## Description
Develop and deploy the foundational Smart Contract Account for Sign90.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Implement custom SCA with upgradability,Support 2/3 multi-sig logic by default,Compatible with ERC-4337 EntryPoint

acceptanceCriteriaItems.text: Implement custom SCA with upgradability,Support 2/3 multi-sig logic by default,Compatible with ERC-4337 EntryPoint

description: Develop and deploy the foundational Smart Contract Account for Sign90.

title: [Feature] Agent24 - Execution Loop
rawContent:
## Description
Deploy the Agent24 autonomous execution engine: Info -> Decision -> Action.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Information gathering module (Oracles/Events),Decision making engine (Rule-based/LLM),Action execution via SCA

acceptanceCriteriaItems.text: Information gathering module (Oracles/Events),Decision making engine (Rule-based/LLM),Action execution via SCA

description: Deploy the Agent24 autonomous execution engine: Info -> Decision -> Action.

title: [Feature] AirAccount - Invisible Crypto Account
rawContent:
## Description
A standalone abstract account project embedded in Chrome Plugin, solving basic crypto account hurdles.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Support social login/recovery,Hide private key management from user,Seamless integration with Chrome Extension

acceptanceCriteriaItems.text: Support social login/recovery,Hide private key management from user,Seamless integration with Chrome Extension

description: A standalone abstract account project embedded in Chrome Plugin, solving basic crypto account hurdles.

title: [Feature] Cos72 - Core Modules (MyTask, MyShop, MyVote)
rawContent:
## Description
Implement the three core modules for Cos72 Chrome Plugin.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] MyTask: Community tasks execution,MyShop: Redeem points for goods/services,MyVote: Snapshot-based governance voting

acceptanceCriteriaItems.text: MyTask: Community tasks execution,MyShop: Redeem points for goods/services,MyVote: Snapshot-based governance voting

description: Implement the three core modules for Cos72 Chrome Plugin.

title: [Demo] Sign90 - Agent Execution Demo
rawContent:
## Description
A demo environment for Sign90 agents (Info -> Decision -> Execution) within the plugin.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Info gathering via simple API,Decision making via AI API call (Demo),Execution via Smart Account,Resource-constrained demo mode

acceptanceCriteriaItems.text: Info gathering via simple API,Decision making via AI API call (Demo),Execution via Smart Account,Resource-constrained demo mode

description: A demo environment for Sign90 agents (Info -> Decision -> Execution) within the plugin.

acceptanceCriteriaItems.text: Define business model,Develop MVP,Integrate with SuperPaymaster

title: [Feature] KMS/TEE - Trusted Execution Environment
rawContent:
## Description

<!-- SECTION:DESCRIPTION:BEGIN -->
Integrate KMS/TEE for secure key management and execution within Sign90.
- STM32MP157F-DK2, power and connect to Mac mini
- Config network and rebuild STLinux distribution version
- Deploy and publish to Internet and test
- Refine or add some APIs
<!-- SECTION:DESCRIPTION:END -->

## Acceptance Criteria
<!-- AC:BEGIN -->
- [ ] #1 Select TEE provider,Implement KMS interface,Verify secure execution
<!-- AC:END -->

## Implementation Plan

<!-- SECTION:PLAN:BEGIN -->
Check https://github.com/jhfnetboy/STM32MP157F-DK2
Working on branch KMS-imigration in AirAccount
<!-- SECTION:PLAN:END -->

## Definition of Done
<!-- DOD:BEGIN -->
- [ ] #1 KMS.aastar.io is running with permanant storage for private key
<!-- DOD:END -->

acceptanceCriteriaItems.text: Select TEE provider,Implement KMS interface,Verify secure execution

definitionOfDoneItems.text: KMS.aastar.io is running with permanant storage for private key

description:
Integrate KMS/TEE for secure key management and execution within Sign90.
- STM32MP157F-DK2, power and connect to Mac mini
- Config network and rebuild STLinux distribution version
- Deploy and publish to Internet and test
- Refine or add some APIs
implementationPlan:
Check https://github.com/jhfnetboy/STM32MP157F-DK2
Working on branch KMS-imigration in AirAccount
